modName: Belly Ring texture for UNP based bodies - contains nudity
summary: Add\'s a belly ring to the human races of the game for the UNP based bodies. UNP, UNP Skinny, UNPB-BBP
descriptionHtml:
This is a re-texture of the UNPB-BBP body to add a belly ring. It\'s a texture only, 
no mesh, so it could look strange from the side.

This should work with all UNP based bodies, as well as the vanilla body (but that will have a weird mesh). I really 
don\'t think it will work with CBBE and ADEC. I have only tried with the Normal 
UNPB-BBP, which is here:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14899

I haven\'t made this for Khajit and Argonian races, if you want it done, tell me.

INSTALL:

Extract contents of the archive and place the Data folder into your main Skyrim
directory.

Use this mod how you like, upload elsewhere, modify, make compatible for other 
bodies. You have my permission.

Feedback is appreciated, and if you have any requests, feel free to ask.


Other mods used in the screenshots are:

ApachiiSkyHair - thank you apachii
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

Better Females by Bella - thank you BellaGail
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812

DynaVision - thank you Gopher
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12525

Realistic Lighting With Customization - thank you Plutoman101
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7654

If I\'ve forgotten any other mods, sorry.

Thanks to Bethesda for Skyrim

Note: In some screen shots, my characters right hand looks different to her left. This is another re-texture mod I\'m currently working on. I will post the link here when I upload it.

You may also like my other mod, Auriels Bow re-texture:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24748/
author: kashif101
